column5: I remember that call  Use it all the time.... sometimes works ... Sometimes ?

Mine is when a mark or a few marks show up on the sonar but aren't interested.  I set the rod down and say 'ok fine. I'm going for a pee/smoke/snack/something else to distract myself with.' Then I stand up and turn around.  60% of the time, it works all the time.

The funny part is when I was a kid and went fishing with my dad I used to try this all the time. Was convinced I wasn't loud enough which is why I couldn't catch fish. Always wondered why my dad would die laughing.
We grew up with the patented Finglish fish call   Soooeeee Kuhla, kuhla, kuhla.
